languages.text: {n}Каллигос почти восхищенно кивает в сторону Ульфара.{/n} "Интересные у тебя друзья, {name}! Всегда мечтал померяться силами с космодесантником... Но и биться бок о бок с могучим союзником всегда приятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос почти восхищенно кивает в сторону Ульфара.{/n} "Интересные у тебя друзья, {name}! Всегда мечтал померяться силами с космодесантником... Но и биться бок о бок с могучим союзником всегда приятно".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос почти восхищенно кивает в сторону Ульфара.{/n} "Интересные у тебя друзья, {name}! Всегда мечтал померяться силами с космодесантником... Но и биться бок о бок с могучим союзником всегда приятно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos almost admiringly nods towards Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is also always welcome."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}La expresión de Calligos raya en la admiración y asiente en dirección a Ulfar.{/n} «¡Tiene usted unos amigos interesantes, {name}! Siempre quise medir mi acero contra un Marine Espacial... Pero luchar codo con codo con un aliado tan formidable también será un placer».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos asiente casi con admiración en dirección a Ulfar.{/n} «¡Tiene usted unos amigos interesantes, {name}! Siempre quise medir mi acero contra un marine espacial... Pero luchar codo con codo con un aliado tan formidable también será un placer».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯几近钦佩地朝乌尔法点点头。{/n}“你的朋友真的很有趣，{name}！我一直希望能和星际战士较量一番……不过，我也很乐于与强大的盟友并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯几近钦佩地朝乌尔法点点头。{/n}“你的朋友真的很有趣，{name}！我一直希望能和星际战士较量一番……不过，我也很乐于与强大的盟友并肩作战。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos hoche la tête d'un air presque admiratif en regardant Ulfar.{/n} « Vous avez des amis intéressants, {name} ! J'ai toujours voulu éprouver ma force contre un Space Marine... mais je ne vais pas refuser la présence d'un allié aussi puissant à mes côtés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos hoche la tête d'un air presque admiratif en regardant Ulfar.{/n} « Vous avez des amis intéressants, {name} ! J'ai toujours voulu éprouver ma force contre un Space Marine... mais je ne vais pas refuser la présence d'un allié aussi puissant à mes côtés. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは感嘆ような表情を浮かべながら、ウルファーに向かってうなずいた。 {/n}「面白い友人がいるようだな、{name}！俺はいつも、スペースマリーン相手に己の力を試してみたちと思っていたが…強大な味方と肩を並べて戦うのも、いつでも歓迎だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスはウルファーに向かって感心したようにうなずいた。 {/n}「面白い友人がいるようだな、{name}！俺はいつも、スペースマリーン相手に己の力を試してみたちと思っていたが…強大な味方と肩を並べて戦うのも、いつでも歓迎だ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos' Miene grenzt an Bewunderung, als er in Richtung Ulfar nickt.{/n} "Ihr habt interessante Freunde, {name}! Ich wollte mich schon immer mal mit einem Space Marine messen ... Aber Seite an Seite mit einem mächtigen Verbündeten kämpfen, ist auch immer willkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos nickt Ulfar fast bewundernd zu.{/n} "Ihr habt interessante Freunde, {name}! Ich wollte mich schon immer mal mit einem Space Marine messen ... Aber Seite an Seite mit einem mächtigen Verbündeten kämpfen, ist auch immer willkommen."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos'un yüzünde Ulfar'a doğru başını eğerken hayranlığı andıran bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "İlginç arkadaşların var {name}! Her zaman gücümü bir Uzay Piyadesi'ne karşı test etmek istemişimdir. Ancak kudretli bir müttefikle omuz omuza savaşmaktan da memnun olurum."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos's expression borders on admiration as he nods toward Ulfar.{/n} "You have interesting friends, {name}! I've always wanted to test my strength against a Space Marine... But fighting side by side with a mighty ally is always welcome as well."
